content: The  of Heaven’s Armies spoke about Edom:

For the  says, “If even those who did not deserve to drink from the cup of my wrath must drink from it, do you think you will go unpunished? You will not go unpunished, but must certainly drink from the cup of my wrath.

For I solemnly swear,” says the , “that Bozrah will become a pile of ruins. It will become an object of horror and ridicule, an example to be used in curses. All the towns around it will lie in ruins forever.”
The  spoke about Kedar and the kingdoms of Hazor that King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon conquered:
This was the s message to the prophet Jeremiah about Elam, which came early in the reign of King Zedekiah of Judah.
